Creating a Virtual Reality Zoo Experience: Develop a virtual reality platform that allows visitors to explore the zoo from the comfort of their own homes. This could include interactive exhibits, live animal feedings, and guided tours. Confidence score: 0.8

Building a Community-Based Zoo: Partner with local organizations and community groups to create a zoo that is not only a tourist attraction, but also a hub for education, conservation, and community engagement. Confidence score: 0.9

Developing a Wildlife Rescue and Rehabilitation Program: Create a program that focuses on rescuing and rehabilitating endangered animals, with the ultimate goal of releasing them back into the wild. Confidence score: 0.7

Hosting Unique and Unconventional Events: Host events such as "Zoo-Themed Movie Nights," "Animal Yoga Classes," and "Zoo-Keeping Workshops" to attract a wider audience and generate additional revenue. Confidence score: 0.6

Implementing Sustainable Practices: Implement sustainable practices such as reducing water usage, using renewable energy sources, and promoting recycling. This not only benefits the environment but also sets the zoo apart as a leader in sustainability. Confidence score: 0.9
